basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I am a full-stack web developer looking to refine my skills mainly using Ruby/Rails and front-end Javascript frameworks.

work.summary: Easyart is a UK-based ecommerce website which sells art prints and posters worldwide. Recently merged with art publisher King & McGaw, the company now controls the entire process from printing, product creation to delivery. A recent rewrite of the 10+ year old platform to a service-oriented architecture will position the company to offer their services to retailers through a standard API.
highlights: Helped design & write a service-based system to power a multi-language/multi-currency website. The new platform is comprised of many simple cloud-based services written mainly with Ruby/Rails.
Refactored and added automated testing to a Backbone app which is the core of the public-facing business. The entire business depends on this single web page working as best as it can.
Helped construct a continuous deployment workflow where new developers could confidently push code on their first day. This was quite a leap forward from the old system.

work.summary: Responsible for executing end-user and software test plans on robotics medication dispensing systems
Design and server administration. E-commerce website on the Magento platform.

Drafted URL structure and outlined SEO plan for which increased visitors by more than 300% in the following 2 months. Helped developers with the many changes and redirects, and managed the transition which saw no loss in SEO rankings for the businesses top keywords.
Coding, database, SEO. Arteposter is an Italian e-commerce website written in PHP (CodeIgniter) with a MySQL database and SOLR search engine.
